name: Beach Defender TD
summary:
Features
•	New age Tower Defense!
•	70 unique levels.
•	7 different beaches.
•	Control 6 weapons simultaneously.
•	3 upgrade slots per weapon.
•	Buy any of 4 different towers to help you.
•	5 total slots to place your towers.
•	3 game save slots.

Weapons
•	Dual machine guns – good for taking out incoming ground troops.
•	Main Cannon – Good for taking out vehicles and aircraft.
•	Mortar Cannon – Great for taking out buildings and heavy artillery.
•	Rocket Launcher – Exceptional for all aerial...
